project.name: Astronomy Runtimes
project.description:
Top Level Project for AR / Workbench
Publisher should just run the goals listed in this project - no need to run goals in individual sub-projects. E.g. to build and publish new suite of BETA AR: 1 Check all changes into CVS 2. Run: % maven astrogrid-clean 3. Edit astrogrid.destop.version in maven-base/project.properties 4. Run: % maven install-materials install-standalone-apps % maven -Dmaven.username=maven publish-beta-site % maven -Dmaven.username=maven publish-beta-jnlp
To setup workbench for development in eclipse: run steps 1-3 above. 4. Run: % maven install-materials 5. cd to 'impl', Run: % maven eclipse 6. In eclipse select 'File > Import > Existing Projects into Workspace', and navigate to the impl directory. This works best in Eclipse >= 3.2.0 - although it's still in beta, it works fine.
If you need to edit the public api, repeast steps 5,6 for the 'api' directory
